elements.title: mayor's office building in Palembang, Indonesia
elements.contents: ... that the mayor's office building in Palembang, Indonesia, was built to function as both a town hall and a water tower?

elements.title: H. P. Lovecraft
elements.contents: ... that when H. P. Lovecraft was five years old, he was told Santa Claus did not exist and responded by asking why "God is not equally a myth"?

elements.title: 1997 Ontario teachers' strike
elements.contents: ... that a leaked memo indicating that a government official would receive a bonus payment if she cut $667 million from Ontario's education budget contributed to the 1997 Ontario teachers' strike?

elements.title: Sharp PC-7000
elements.contents: ... that the Sharp PC-7000, compared in shape to a toaster, was manufactured in a factory that also produced Sharp's microwave ovens?

elements.title: body image disturbance
elements.contents: ... that body image disturbance is a common symptom in patients with eating disorders?

elements.title: evacuated to Trenton, New Jersey
elements.contents: ... that in 1799, the federal government of the United States was evacuated to Trenton, New Jersey due to an outbreak of yellow fever?

elements.title: John Ford Elkington
elements.contents: ... that 50-year-old Lieutenant Colonel John Ford Elkington was reinstated into the British Army in 1916 after winning medals for bravery while serving in the ranks of the French Foreign Legion?

elements.title: a ship
elements.contents: ... that in 1863, the Union Navy built a ship with an outhouse serving as the pilothouse?
